author: noah_gant
title: They don't make them like they used too.
review:
This was one of the first ever Lego sets I got when I was younger. To this day, I still think it is a fantastic set for all ages.

Pros

-Large amount of pieces for a low price

-Easy,simple builds.

- This set gives you a lot of standard Lego bricks, which is welcome to any collection

Cons

-The builds are vey simplistic, but given the recommended age you'd expect that.

- Thinner plates would have been easier to use instead of thick ones

 

Overall this is a great set for all ages, much better than any (if not all) the Lego Classic sets that have been released recently.
